name: Cards of Life
description:
As a submission for the Ludum Dare 44 with the theme: "Your life is curreny".

We have created a realtime rogue like dungeon card game !

Yes it is as crazy as it sounds ! You, a cute racoon (definitely not from avengers or something), try to dodge the evil monsters of the dungeon, while waiting for your time to draw a powerful, magical card, letting the enemy burn down in flames !

After each round you can improve your deck by up to 3 new cards. The better you play, the more cards you can get ! Only your remaining life points can be traded for new cards. So be fast, be precise and fight your way through the endless hordes of enemies !

Created by Maarten, Joshua, Krysta and me =)
